### Theme Plot

```{r}
PAVER_theme_plot(.[[1]])
```

### Regulation Plot

```{r}
PAVER_regulation_plot(.[[1]]) +
  ggprism::theme_prism(base_size = 9)
```

### Interpretation Plot

```{r}
x <- PAVER_interpretation_plot(.[[1]])
x$layers[[2]] <- NULL

x <- x + geom_text_repel(size = 9 / ggplot2::.pt) 
x + ggprism::theme_prism(base_size = 9)
```

### Heatmap Plot

```{r}
x <- quiet(PAVER_hunter_plot(.[[1]], unit = .[[2]]))
```
